```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```

```{r}
survival_early <- read_csv("../../Data/voles_early.csv")

```


```{r}
ggplot(survival_early, aes(x=mass, y= survival, color=interaction(sex,age)))+
  geom_beeswarm(groupOnX = FALSE) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", method.args=list(family="binomial"))


summary(late_m0 <- glm(survival ~ 1 + mass + sex*age,
                       data=survival_early, family = "binomial"))

summary(late_m0 <- glm(survival ~ 1 + mass + mass*age+ as.factor(year),
                       data=survival_early, family = "binomial"))
```
